Description: Holy Family resting on the flight into Egypt, with angels bringing a sheet to shelter the family from the sun, while others are adoring Child, after Poussin; and St Irene with man and woman, tending the wounds of St Sebastian, after Schedoni; both scenes are printed on the same sheet from one single plate; illustration to Saint Non's 'Voyage pittoresque de Naples et de Sicile' (Paris, 1781-86). c.1781/83 Etching and engraving
Producer name: Print made by: Charles François Adrien Macret
Associated names: Illustration to: Abbé Jean Claude Richard de Saint-Non
Representation of: St Irene of Rome
Associated titles: Voyage pittoresque de Naples et de Sicile
